Topic.Title: Well in Zork I got out of the maze so I saved - and the whole page disappeared lol.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

If you're playing the version on this site, it is a Z-machine game, and the saving doesn't seem to work very well in a browser.  I would advise installing the FROTZ interpreter and playing from it.  (If you're on an Android device, try TextFiction.)

Sorry, but I have no other suggestion.  (Perhaps someone else will, though.)
